	Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, Outlook).

	Well-groomed, courteous, and presentable at all times.


Salary
N130,000 &ndash; N160,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;cv@ascentech.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist (Female)

Job Location: Itamope, Ikorodu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Administration / Front Office
Reports To: Admin / Office Manager

Job Summary

	The Receptionist will be the first point of contact for visitors and clients, responsible for creating a welcoming environment while managing front desk operations efficiently.
	She will handle incoming calls, visitor inquiries, and provide general administrative support to ensure smooth office operations.


Responsibilities


	Greet and welcome visitors in a professional and friendly manner.
	Answer, screen, and forward incoming calls, providing accurate information when required.
	Manage front desk activities including correspondence, scheduling, and inquiries.
	Maintain visitor logs and ensure security protocols are followed.
	Assist with clerical tasks such as filing, photocopying, scanning, and data entry.
	Coordinate meeting room bookings and ensure readiness for meetings.
	Receive and distribute mails, deliveries, and packages promptly.
	Provide administrative support to other departments when required.
	Maintain a clean and organized reception area at all times.


Requirements


	Minimum of HND or B.Sc. in any discipline.
	Prior experience as a receptionist, front desk officer.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Strong interpersonal and customer service skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, Outlook).
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and maintain professionalism under pressure.
	Well-groomed, courteous, and presentable at all times.

N130,000 – N160,000 Monthly.

Procurement Officer Job at Chilis Restaurant




        
    

        
        Chilis Restaurant, a 24-hour restaurant with good quality of food and good services, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location: Ring Road, Ibadan - Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description

	Supplier Selection: Finding and evaluating suppliers for ingredients, equipment, and services
	Contract Negotiation: Negotiating prices, terms, and conditions with suppliers.
	Purchasing: Buying ingredients, beverages, equipment, and supplies necessary for operations
	Inventory Management: Managing inventory levels, tracking usage, and optimizing stock levels.
	Cost Control: Analyzing prices, tracking expenses, and identifying opportunities for cost savings.
	Quality Control: Ensuring purchased products meet quality and safety standards.
	Supplier Relationship Management: Building and maintaining relationships with suppliers.
	Risk Management: Mitigating risks associated with supply chain disruptions, price fluctuations, and supplier insolvency.
	Compliance: Ensuring compliance with regulations, such as food safety and labeling requirements
	Data Analysis: Analyzing procurement data to identify trends, optimize purchasing decisions, and improve operations
	Menu Engineering: Collaborating with chefs to develop menus that balance profitability and customer appeal.
	Waste Management: Minimizing waste and optimizing inventory usage to reduce environment impact.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 2 - 6 years of work experience.
	Proximity to Ringroad is preferred.


Salary
N60,000 - N80,000 monthly

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: chilisrestaurant.ibadan@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Supervisor",
  "description": "TV Deluxe Global is a Nigeria-based company offering a wide range of tailored operational services. They focus on supply chain management, e-commerce, logistics, safety consultancy, agriculture, and last-mile delivery, delivering bespoke business solutions with a global perspective and local expertise.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Supervisor

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type:&nbsp;Full-Time

About the Role


	We are seeking a proactive and results-driven Business Development Supervisor to lead our business growth initiatives.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for supervising the business development team, driving revenue growth, building strong client relationships, and identifying new market opportunities to support the company&rsquo;s strategic goals.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead and supervise the business development team to achieve set targets and KPIs.
	Identify and pursue new business opportunities across relevant sectors and markets.
	Develop and implement business strategies to expand the company&rsquo;s market presence.
	Build, maintain, and nurture strong client and stakeholder relationships.
	Conduct market research to identify emerging trends, competitors, and customer needs.
	Prepare and deliver compelling business proposals, presentations, and reports.
	Collaborate with internal teams (Marketing, Operations, Finance) to ensure seamless project execution.
	Provide mentorship, coaching, and performance feedback to team members.
	Monitor and evaluate sales performance, ensuring continuous improvement.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (MBA is an added advantage).
	Minimum of 5&ndash;8 years of proven experience in business development,leadership, Business Development, Sales, or related fields.
